      • node.SendFileThread

extends java.lang.Thread

                      Node node,
                      SocketHandler sHandler)
        The constructor method for the SendFileThread.
        Parameters:
        files - List of files to be sent
        rmi - the remote method invocation object used to communicate with the nameServer.
        node - the node that sends the files.
        sHandler - the object that maintains all the sockets.

      • getIP

        private java.lang.String getIP(java.lang.String name)
                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Send server a message with the name of a file, requesting the ip of the node that needs to be sent to. return null if
        Parameters:
        name - the name of file
        Returns:
        the ip of the client node.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Something went wrong while using the remote method invocation to the name server.

      • createJsonString

        private java.lang.String createJsonString(java.lang.String name,
                                          long size)
        Create the string that needs to be sent to the other node.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the file.
        size - the size of the file.
        Returns:
        the string for the user, on failure returns an empty string.
